server {
    listen 80;
    server_name _;

    # to avoid any error while fetching fevicon
    location = /favicon.ico { access_log off; log_not_found off; }

    location /static/ {
        root /home/ubuntu/Website;
    }

    location / {
        include proxy_params;
        # communicate via socket file created by Gunicorn
        proxy_pass http://unix:/run/takadah.sock;
    }
}
sudo ln -s /etc/nginx/sites-available/takadah /etc/nginx/sites-enabled
gunicorn --workers 3 --bind 0.0.0.0:8000 takadah.wsgi:application
gunicorn --workers 3 --bind unix:/run/takadah.sock takadah.wsgi:application
